item.title: Debugging wasm app with WAMR
item.description: Image from https://pspdfkit.com/blog/2020/the-state-of-debugging-in-webassembly/ Table Of Contents Background Setup Debugging with CLI Debugging with VSCode Remote debugging Issue with evaluation feature FAQ Background # Debugging takes a great part in application development, debuggers provide the capability to inspect the internal state of the execution programs, which make it easier to let the program work properly. It is hard to imagine a programming world without debugger. Luckily, WAMR has supported source debugging feature based on lldb, and now is ready for use.
